titleStmt.title: A dialogue betwene a knyght and a clerke concernynge the power spiritual and temporall.
Disputatio inter clericum et miletem. English.
A dialogue betwene a knyght and a clerke concernynge the power spiritual and temporall.
Disputatio inter clericum et miletem. English.
titleStmt.author: William, of Ockham, ca. 1285-ca. 1349, attributed name.
Dubois, Pierre, fl. 1300, attributed name.
Trevisa, John, d. 1402.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the cundite at the sygne of the Lucrece,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by John Trevisa, of: Disputatio inter clericum et miletem super potestate prelatis ecclesi√¶ atque principibus terrarum commissa sub forma dialogi.
The Latin original is variously attributed to William of Ockham and Pierre Dubois.
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
